bibl.title: Callimachus, Istrus and the Statue of Delian Apollo.
bibl.note: Fr. 114 Pf., 4-17. "We have here a piece of mythical cult-aetiology from pre-historic Cos involving a statue of Apollo. The poem may have been an adjunct or rider to Callimachus' Hymn to Delos."
bibl.seg: JACKSON Steven, Callimachus, Istrus and the Statue of Delian Apollo.
Fr. 114 Pf., 4-17. "We have here a piece of mythical cult-aetiology from pre-historic Cos involving a statue of Apollo. The poem may have been an adjunct or rider to Callimachus' Hymn to Delos."
